message: Let's be fair, Bob. Take 10%, I'll take the rest. It's a good start!
I'll take a bigger share, but it's still a fair deal. You can't expect everything to be 50/50, can you?
Okay, Bob, I'm willing to compromise a bit more.  Let's split it 80/20 this time. It's still a good deal for both of us.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a bit more. You're getting a good deal, but I'm not getting enough. Let's try again!
Alright Bob, let's see if we can come to an agreement. I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I need to get at least 75%. How about 75/25?
I think we're getting close, but I'm not willing to give up yet. I'll meet you halfway again, but I'm hoping you'll see things from my perspective. Let's try to find a middle ground!
